alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 18 at 11:49AM CST until January 18 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Union County in south central Arkansas... Southeastern Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 1230 PM CST. * At 1149 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shongaloo, or 10 miles southeast of Springhill, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springhill, Haynesville, Cullen, Sarepta, Emerson, Shongaloo, Village, Atlanta, Evergreen, Hew Hope, Leton, Walkerville, Marysville, Noxobe, Three Creeks, Horsehead and Spotville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for south central and southwestern Arkansas...and northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for south central and southwestern Arkansas...and northwestern Louisiana.
